meanings.definition: Put forward for consideration or acceptance.
meanings.sent1: She propones her idea during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: He always propones new solutions to problems.
meanings.sent3: The cat propones a plan to catch the mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun propones its rays over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The teacher propones a fun project for the class.

meanings.sent1: He propones a movie for us to watch.
meanings.sent2: She propones a new restaurant for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The clown propones wearing a hat made of balloons.
meanings.sent4: The wind propones a dance with the leaves.
meanings.sent5: The book propones an exciting adventure for the readers.
